question: Who is the director of the movie Marghe and Her Mother, which is the closing film of 50th International Film Festival of India-2019?
explanation: Marghe and Her Mother, directed by Iranian filmmaker, Mohsen Makhmalbaf will be the Closing Film of the 50th International Film Festival of India (IFFI). The film revolves around Marghe, a six-year-old girl who lives with her single mother, Claudia, who has been kicked out of her house because of payment difficulties, leaving Marghe to an older woman next door.
